channel.title: Connection Problems? All done :S
channel.description:
Hi
Ive done the Port Forwarding on my router and allowed ports through my firewall. I run my server it says STARTING BLAH BLAH 00.00.00:43594
I go on Moparscape and It says ERROR : CANT CONNECT.
I try with localhost, works fine. Just wont let me on. Ive done NO IP - Done that correctly. Done router - Done firewall...
Whats the problem ?
Appreciate if you could help ty
